resources.string: Since this is your first time using the app, we need your help to tell us your interests.\n\n
You can choose more than one category to represent your interests.
Invite people to collaborate in the business idea. An invitation email will be sent to them.
Are you sure want to skip this step? You won\'t be able to invite partners for this idea in the future.

Step by step add new idea:
 1. Add business name, 
 background, problem, and
 solution
 2. Make Business Model Canvas
 3. Arrange SWOT
The reason why you think your idea is brilliant?
What problems are solved by your idea?
How does your Idea solve the problem?
Now itâ€™s time to make your business plan.
Strengths and weaknesses are often internal to your organization, while opportunities and threats generally relate to external factors.
Business model canvas is a framework created by combining multiple blocks that each of them could represents our business idea.
Click on the search icon at the top right corner to start searching
No one has liked this idea
No one has commented on this idea
Are you sure want to remove this user from your connection?
Are you sure want to delete this Idea?
You must choose at least one.
This idea is private.\nOnly connected users are allowed to view.
If this feature is enabled, your idea details will only be visible to your connections.

What is your idea's strength?

What makes your idea superior than other?

What people in your market see as your strengths?

What is the weakness of your idea?

What factors that could make you lose your sales?

What are people in your market likely to see as weaknesses?

What kind of opportunities that you see for your idea?

What kind of trend that "booming" right now?

What kind of needs that you spot on?
Who is your competitor?\n\nWhat obstacles that you face?
From where will you get profit?

Which Key Resources are most expensive?

Which Key Activities are most expensive?

What is the most important cost that our business model need?
Who are the most important partners that you need?\n\nWho is your key supplier?

What kind of activities that crucial to do?

How to reach your customer segment?

How to get more revenue stream?
What are key resources that you need for our value proposition?
Type of relationship that company want to create with their customer? for example: customer service, online service , and etc

How does the company reach the customer? example for entrepreneur : online store, store front

How do you delivery the item?

How do you handle after sales?

What value that will help user?

What is the value that user willing to pay?

What kind of service that you provide?

What is special value that others don't have?
Who will buy your value?\n\nWho are the most important customers?
